General.Name: Mobi724 Global Solutions Inc
General.Description: Mobi724 Global Solutions Inc., a fintech company, offers a suite of integrated data-driven business intelligence and artificial intelligence powered card-linked offers and reward solutions in North America and Latin America. Its processing platform enables card issuing banks, payment networks, merchants, and loyalty program operators to manage, deliver, track, and measure incentive campaigns in real time. The company was formerly known as Hybrid Paytech World Inc. and changed its name to Mobi724 Global Solutions Inc. in February 2015. Mobi724 Global Solutions Inc. was incorporated in 2005 and is headquartered in Montreal, Canada.
General.Address: 1275 Avenue des Canadiens-de-MontrEal, Montreal, QC, Canada, H3B 0G4
